sentence.Network_en: The lawyer's son - in - law likes hawk's claws and jaws.
sentence.Network_cn: 律师的 女婿 喜欢鹰爪和下颌.

sentence.Network_en: Their eyes are large and shaped like a hawk's, and their faces are sharp and angular.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们的眼睛很大、鹰一样敏锐, 它们的脸棱角相当分明.

sentence.Network_en: Zelda had hawk's eyes and a thin mouth and deep - south manners and accent.
sentence.Network_cn: 姗尔达有一双鹰一样的眼睛,嘴唇薄薄的,举止和口音带着南方腹地的色彩.

PerfectNetExp.abs: hawjam 山楂酱, hawk's-beard 还阳参, hawjuice 山楂果汁
hawjuice 山楂果汁, hawk's-beard 还阳参属, hawk's-beard 还阳参

means.word_mean: 1. any of various plants of the genus Crepis having loose heads of yellow flowers on top of a long branched leafy stem; northern hemisphere

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Powell's war-hawk foes seemed to me both bullying and unrealistic.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Powell's war-hawk foes seemed to me both bullying and unrealistic.

auth_sentence.content: His grass-green eye Missed neither swoop nor swerve of the hawk's wing.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: His grass-green eye Missed neither swoop nor swerve of the hawk's wing.

auth_sentence.content: He promised to watch the treaty's development "like a hawk".
